flawed_nl_solution:
He increased his speed by 150*0.3=45 mph
So his new speed was 150+45=<<150+45=915>>915 mph
He increased it a further 10 mph so his new speed is 915+10=<<915+10=925>>925 mph
#### 925

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 195, not 915. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
